target.description: Calculate the area of a circle given the radius.
target.name: calculate_circle_area

target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given the lengths of its sides using Heron's formula.
target.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

target.code:
def calculate_ratio_of_areas(area1, area2):
    return area1 / area2
target.description: Calculate the ratio of areas of two triangles given their side lengths and area ratios.
target.name: calculate_ratio_of_areas

target.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a frustum given the top and bottom radii and height.
target.name: calculate_area_of_frustum

target.code:
def calculate_power_of_circle(radius, height):
    return radius * height
target.description: Calculate the product of the radius and height of a cylinder given its dimensions.
target.name: calculate_power_of_circle

target.description: Calculate the surface area of a right prism given base area and height.
target.name: calculate_surface_area_of_prism

target.description: Calculate the area of various shapes based on given parameters.
target.name: calculate_area_of_shape
